pageTitle: Sigerson Morrison Solita Tall Boots | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements True to US sizing. Fit Size & Fit Circumference: 14.5in / 37cm Shaft: 20.75in / 53cm Heel: 2in / 50mm Measurements This item cannot be gift-boxed. Imported, China. Leather: Calfskin. Soft, stretch leather gives these Sigerson Morrison over-the-knee boots a close, sexy fit. An almond toe structures the silhouette, and cozy, low-pile fleece lining adds a cozy touch. Covered side zip. Stacked heel and leather sole. Description Boots > Shoes > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Started in 1991 by Kari Sigerson and Miranda Morrison, Sigerson Morrison was founded on the philosophy that "style, rather than fashion, is key." The brand captures the clean, contemporary lines of classic footwear and updates them with modern finishes. Offering trend-defying designs, Sigerson Morrison won immediate praise from editors, celebrities, and industry insiders, and the legacy continues decades later. Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free. Return Details Shipping Available: Shipping Within USA Only: For Amazon Prime members, free two-day shipping is available for all Shopbop products.
